Robards was born in Chicago, Illinois on July 26, 1922.Jason Robards genealogy. == Personal life == He married to Eleanor Pittman from 1948 to 1958. He married Rachel Taylor from 1959 to 1961. He married Lauren Bacall from 1961 to 1969. He married Lois O'Connor from 1970 to 2000. He had six children.
